pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Performing Pharmacokinetic-Pharmacodynamic Simulations // Simulate dose regimens for pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic (PK-PD) models described by differential equation (DE) systems. Simulation using ADVAN-style analytical equations is also supported (Abuhelwa et al. (2015) doi:10.1016/j.vascn.2015.03.004).
